required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® for Presbyopic Contact Lens Wearers
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study of OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® for Presbyopic Contact Lens Wearers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® (OFPM) compared to non-HYDRAGLYDE® multipurpose contact lens solutions in presbyopes currently wearing soft contact lenses and experiencing symptoms of dryness.

primary_outcome.measure: Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire-8 (CLDEQ-8) score at Day 30
primary_outcome.description: CLDEQ-8 score (assessment of contact lens discomfort) as obtained by adding the numerical responses to each of 8 items (range 0 to 37).

arm_group.description: OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® multi-purpose contact lens solution in Period 1, followed by participant's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution (HMPS) in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with participant's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles

Participant's habitual multi-purpose contact lens solution in Period1, followed by OPTI-FREE® PureMoist® contact lens solution in Period 2. Each product used daily per packaging instructions with participant's habitual contact lenses for approximately 30 cleaning and disinfection cycles.

intervention.description: Participant's habitual contact lens brand worn in a daily wear modality for 30 days.

facility.name: Contact Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations
